articles.description: The Telegraph are reporting that the three-week deadline is because Maciek Kaminski is hoping to introduce himself to boss Frank Lampard during the club's pre-season tour of the US.
articles.content:
The Kaminski family, who are bankrolling a takeover bid for Everton, reportedly want to reach an agreement to buy the Premier League club by July 21.

articles.title: Liverpool's handling of Mo Salah contract slammed by Jamie O'Hara: 'They have to get it sorted' - Daily Mail
articles.description: With the club and Salah's representatives at loggerheads over his wage demands, there is talk of Liverpool selling their prize asset this summer to ensure they recoup some money and don't lose him for free next year.
articles.content:
Jamie O'Hara has blasted Liverpool's managing of club superstar Mohamed Salah as 'unacceptable' and implored them to resolve his ongoing contract dispute.

articles.description: Many of the ladies arriving on the Oxfordshire town's riverbanks in the sunshine donned their finery for the event wearing vibrant dresses for the high society day out.
articles.content:
Rowing fans donned skimpy slip dresses and trendy form-fitting jumpsuits as they attended the second day of the Henley Royal Regatta in Oxfordshire this morning.

articles.title: Caitlyn Jenner sparks debate over ban on transgender female athletes in swimming - Daily Mail
articles.description: The TV personality, 72, has previously spoken out in support of a governing body FINA's new policy that bans transgender women from competing in swimming races.
articles.content:
